SDBDataConnector Class Reference

Provides an Objective-C Wrapper around libSDB for SimpleDB Connections Response data is formated as plain foundation objects. Array or results: NSArray. Result Item: NSDictionary {"itemName":{"key1":"value","key2":"value"}itemTwoNAme...}. More...

#import <SDBDataConnector.h>

Inherits NSObject.

(BOOL) - inMultiMode
 Returns if self is currently accumulating operations for a endMultiOperations commit.
(void) - beginMultiOperations
 Begins a multiple operation mode. no writes/selects are actually triggered until a corresponding -endMultiOperations.
(void) - endMultiOperations
 Finalizes all the operations and executes them. Upon completion, returns and populates the -(NSDictionary*)multiResults dictionary.
(NSDictionary *) - multiResults
 Returns the results of the operations. Domains are defined as the based keys, as well as statistic information.

Detailed Description

Provides an Objective-C Wrapper around libSDB for SimpleDB Connections Response data is formated as plain foundation objects. Array or results: NSArray. Result Item: NSDictionary {"itemName":{"key1":"value","key2":"value"}itemTwoNAme...}.

TODO: Provide a memcached wrapper for in-memory caching of objects.

DataSource.plist keys required.

account: The amazon sdb account
secret: The secret
